p: Given the past experiences outlined above and the current threat of SARS-CoV-2, experts have proposed the potential clinical benefit of convalescent plasma in the management of COVID-19 infected patients [ 1, 3, 7, 30, 44]. To date though, only three case series of convalescent plasma in the setting of COVID-19 has been published from January to April of 2020 (See Table 1 for summary of reports) [ [45], [46], [47]].
